gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 136, Pistons 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Pistons, 136-113. Tyrese Haliburton led the way for the Pacers with 26 points and 10 assists, while Myles Turner added 23 points and 10 rebounds in the victory. Cade Cunningham tallied 31 points and five assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 4-0 in East Group A play, 9-6 in the regular season, while the Pistons fall to 0-4 in East Group A play, 2-14 in the regular season.
